title: Crock-Pot Chicken Tacos
directions: Place chicken in the bottom of the slow cooker.
Cook on low (for 6-8 hours) or high (for 4 hours).
Just before serving, use two forks to shred the chicken.
Stir to evenly distribute salsa throughout chicken.
ingredients: For serving: tortillas or taco shells and your choice of optional toppings, such as shredded lettuce, chopped tomatoes, shredded cheese, black beans, corn, chopped avocados or guacamole, reduced-fat sour cream, and hot sauce
